chronoMod:Accelerate.NAME: Accelerate
chronoMod:Accelerate.DESCRIPTION: Trigger all Recall effects this turn.

chronoMod:ArcaneBarrage.NAME: Arcane Barrage
chronoMod:ArcaneBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL When you draw this card, increase its number of hits by 1 this combat and gain 1 Jade.

chronoMod:ArcaneBlessing.NAME: Arcane Blessing
chronoMod:ArcaneBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you consume Jade, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.
chronoMod:ArcaneBlessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you consume Jade, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

chronoMod:ArcaneBolt.NAME: Arcane Bolt
chronoMod:ArcaneBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have Jade, gain 1 Jade to deal double damage.

chronoMod:AstralBanishment.NAME: Astral Banishment
chronoMod:AstralBanishment.DESCRIPTION: Require: [E] [E] [E]. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL Gain [E] for each enemy killed this way.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Not enough Energy to play this card.

chronoMod:AstralBeam.NAME: Astral Beam
chronoMod:AstralBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 Jade.
chronoMod:AstralBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 Jade.

chronoMod:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
chronoMod:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!X damage. NL Gain X Jade. NL Exhaust.

chronoMod:BoomerangBlade.NAME: Boomerang Blade
chronoMod:BoomerangBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place this card onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:ContinuumShift.NAME: Continuum Shift
chronoMod:ContinuumShift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Recall: Gain !B! Block.

chronoMod:DejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
chronoMod:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Play the last card that you played.

chronoMod:DistortReality.NAME: Distort Reality
chronoMod:DistortReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your discard pile onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
chronoMod:EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !M! [E].
chronoMod:EventHorizon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain !B! Block and !M! [E].

chronoMod:FalsePromise.NAME: False Promise
chronoMod:FalsePromise.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 4 cards in a single turn, gain [E] , !M! Jade and draw !M! card.
chronoMod:FalsePromise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play 4 cards in a single turn, gain [E] , !M! Jade and draw !M! card.

chronoMod:Flux.NAME: Flux
chronoMod:Flux.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Jade.

chronoMod:FortunesEnd.NAME: Fortune's End
chronoMod:FortunesEnd.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Jade. NL Deal !D! damage for each Jade you have.

chronoMod:Glimpse.NAME: Glimpse
chronoMod:Glimpse.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.
chronoMod:Glimpse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:GoofOff.NAME: Goof Off
chronoMod:GoofOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

chronoMod:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
chronoMod:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain [E] and 1 Jade. NL Put this card onto the top of your draw pile.
chronoMod:LucidDream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and 1 Jade. NL Put this card onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:ManaBall.NAME: Mana Ball
chronoMod:ManaBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you draw this card, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

chronoMod:ManaBarrier.NAME: Mana Barrier
chronoMod:ManaBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When you draw this card, increase its Block by !M! this combat.

chronoMod:Memento.NAME: Memento
chronoMod:Memento.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, you can choose to place !M! card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

chronoMod:MysticBarrier.NAME: Mystic Barrier
chronoMod:MysticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each Jade that you have.

chronoMod:MysticFlare.NAME: Mystic Flare
chronoMod:MysticFlare.DESCRIPTION: Recall: Deal !D! damage twice X times.

chronoMod:MysticShot.NAME: Mystic Shot
chronoMod:MysticShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage for each Jade you have.

chronoMod:SpellBoost.NAME: Spell Boost
chronoMod:SpellBoost.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of the next cost X card played by !M!.

chronoMod:StarSurge.NAME: Star Surge
chronoMod:StarSurge.DESCRIPTION: Recall: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

chronoMod:TemperedFate.NAME: Tempered Fate
chronoMod:TemperedFate.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose HP. Gain 1 Jade when this effect triggers.

chronoMod:TidesOfTime.NAME: Tides of Time
chronoMod:TidesOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you trigger a Recall effect, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

chronoMod:TimeDilation.NAME: Time Dilation
chronoMod:TimeDilation.DESCRIPTION: Recall: Apply !M! Weak to enemies who intend to attack, and !M! Vulnerable to those who do not.

chronoMod:TipOfTheTongue.NAME: Tip of the Tongue
chronoMod:TipOfTheTongue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a random card from your discard pile into your hand.
chronoMod:TipOfTheTongue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

chronoMod:TwilightAssault.NAME: Twilight Assault
chronoMod:TwilightAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] and 1 Jade.

chronoMod:WheelOfTime.NAME: Wheel of Time
chronoMod:WheelOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Your next Attack deals !M!X additional damage.

chronoMod:Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
chronoMod:Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, gain 1 Intangible and !M! Jade. NL Exhaust.
